basicInfo.desc: This Task provides the ability to transform a report with the style specified on the request keys as 'styleName'.

parameter.name: styleName
parameter.desc: The style to use to transform the RWBean. If omitted, a simple MessageResult is generated.

parameter.name: rwb
parameter.desc: The state of the RWBean

parameter.name: objectID
parameter.desc: The object ID of the Document to execute.

parameter.name: messageID
parameter.desc: The Message ID of a previously executed Document.

parameter.name: gridsResultFlags
parameter.desc: The results flags that apply to all grids in the document. See EnumDSSXMLResultFlags for details.

parameter.name: execFlags
parameter.desc: The execution flags to use. See EnumDSSXMLDocExecutionFlags for details.

parameter.name: partialDisplayKeys
parameter.desc: A comma-separated list of grid keys. Used in case only some grids on the document are to be executed

parameter.name: objType
parameter.desc: A value from the EnumDSSXMLObjectTypes. Used when converting a report to a document

parameter.name: reportViewMode
parameter.desc: A value from the EnumWebReportViewMode. Used when converting a report to a document

parameter.name: reportStateID
parameter.desc: Used when converting a report to a document

parameter.name: minimalData
parameter.desc: Conveys whether minimal data should be collected from the Intelligence Server. See WebComponent.collectMinimalData for details.

parameter.name: originMessageID
parameter.desc: The parameter to specify the prompt answers using the previous message ID

parameter.name: promptsAnswerXML
parameter.desc: The parameter to specify the prompt answers using the prompt answer xml

parameter.name: elementsPromptAnswers
parameter.desc: The parameter to specify the answers for the element prompts

parameter.name: valuePromptAnswers
parameter.desc: The parameter to specify the answers for the value prompts

parameter.name: objectsPromptAnswers
parameter.desc: The parameter to specify the answers for the object prompts

parameter.name: linkAnswers
parameter.desc: The parameter to specify the answers for the prompts using the link Answers

parameter.name: creationFlags
parameter.desc: Creation flags from EnumDSSXMLRWEaseCreationFlags for converting a report to a document

parameter.name: executionMode
parameter.desc: The parameter to specify the execution mode to run the document. See EnumDSSXMLExecutionFlags for details.

parameter.name: templateID
parameter.desc: Template ID for converting a report to a document

parameter.name: maxWait
parameter.desc: The time to wait for the polling. Set this value to 0 (zero) if you don't need to poll for results

parameter.name: useTerseElementId
parameter.desc: To use terse element id's (group by element id minimized)

parameter.name: availableWidth
parameter.desc: The width of the available screen area. Used in the MicroStrategy Mobile app when document layout zoom type is fit to width or fit to page.

parameter.name: availableHeight
parameter.desc: The height of the available screen area. Used in the MicroStrategy Mobile app when document layout is optimized for micro-app and zoom type is fit to page.

parameter.name: executionOrientation
parameter.desc: The orientation of the phone when sending the request.

parameter.name: includeThresholdDetails
parameter.desc: Whether to include the threshold details information
